title: McCullough and Pitts
description:
Image Source: www.semanticscholar.org
McCulloch (right) and Pitts (left) in 1949

In 1943 American neurophysiologist and cybernetician of the University of Illinois at ChicagoOffsite Link Warren McCullochOffsite Link and self-taught logician and cognitive psychologist Walter PittsOffsite Link published “A Logical Calculus of the ideas Imminent in Nervous ActivityOffsite Link,” describing the “McCulloch - Pitts neuronOffsite Link, ”the first mathematical model of a neural network.
